instructionsTips: Get in position to record the bathroom
Here is an example of a bathroom shot
shots.name: Bathroom
shots.setupInstructions: Record a bathroom from right to left

instructionsTips: Get in position to record a bedroom
Here is an example of a bedroom shot
shots.name: Bedroom
shots.setupInstructions: Record a bedroom from bottom to top

instructionsTips: Speak to your front camera
Crop your sequence if required
shots.name: Commented
shots.setupInstructions: Speak in front of the camera (min 4s - max 60s)

instructionsTips: Get in position to record the introduction shot
Your logo will appear on the introduction shot
shots.name: Introduction
shots.setupInstructions: Record the best angle of the property

instructionsTips: Get in position to record the kitchen
Here is an example of a kitchen shot
shots.name: Kitchen
shots.setupInstructions: Record the kitchen from top to bottom

instructionsTips: Get in position to record the living room
Here is an example of a living room shot
shots.name: Living Room
shots.setupInstructions: Record the living room from left to right

instructionsTips: Start walking slowly in a chosen direction
Example of a minilapse
shots.name: Minilapse

instructionsTips: Speak to your front camera
Crop your sequence if required
shots.name: Commented
shots.setupInstructions: Speak in front of the camera (min 4s - max 60s)

instructionsTips: Get in position to record a logo shot
Your logo will appear as in this example
shots.name: Logo
shots.setupInstructions: Record the best angle of the property

instructionsTips: Start walking slowly in a chosen direction
Example of a possible minilapse
shots.name: Minilapse

instructionsTips: Start recording and stop when you are done
Crop your sequence if required
shots.name: Standard

instructionsTips: Speak behind your camera
Crop your sequence if required
shots.name: Voice-over

instructionsTips: Start walking slowly in a chosen direction
Example of a possible speed up shot
shots.name: Speed Up
